articles.summary: Gaborone â€” The World Bank's Board of Executive Directors approved the Botswana Health Emergency Preparedness, Response and Resilience (HEPRR) Project, which will support the strengthening of the country's ability to withstand future pandemics, climate-related illnesses, and everyday health challenges. articles.summary: Activists said on Tuesday (January 27, 2026) that at least 6,126 people were killed in Iran's crackdown on nationwide protests , and many more are still feared dead. Also Read | U.S. deploys aircraft carrier as Iran warns against attack The new figures came from the U.S.-based Human Rights Activists News Agency, which has been accurate in multiple rounds of unrest in Iran.
